text: "One Call Away" is a 2015 song by Charlie Puth and is the second single from his debut studio album Nine Track Mind (2016). It went to number 3 in Australia and New Zealand, number 4 in Lebanon and Slovakia, number 5 in South Africa, number 8 in Austria, number 10 in Switzerland, number 12 in Belgium and the United States, number 13 in Denmark, number 15 in Canada, number 21 in Sweden, number 24 in the Netherlands, number 26 in Portugal and the United Kingdom and number 30 in Germany. == References == Category:2015 songs Category:Charlie Puth songs Category:Pop-soul songs
title: One Call Away
